name: ZERO - GBJam #8 Space Shooter
description:
ZERO is a 2D space shooter game where you face endless enemies. The more enemies you kill, the higher your score will be.

Pick-up collectibles to regain your HP or to have an increased rate of fire for a few seconds!

The game features an "invincibility frames" mechanic that prevent you to get obliterated when you're getting hit!

It has been made in a few days for the GBJAM8 by myself as a solo developer.

Disclaimer: this game is a prototype made for the game jam. Depending on how it goes, it might either be developed further or abandoned.

Played it? Please rate and leave a comment!

Controls:
  • Left, Right, Up & Down arrow keys to move your ship.
  • Hold Left Control to shoot.
  • Press Space when on the main menu to start a new game.
  • Alt + Enter to toggle between windowed and full screen.
